content: an easy cute baby cardigan designed in 4 sizes and recently revamped in 2023 top-raglan construction makes this a completely seamless design perfect for your first sweater project pattern includes link to my coffee bean tips page which includes information tips and tutorials for all the techniques used in the pattern find the matching hat pattern here 1 are you looking for a similar pattern but for older kids check out my wonder years 2 cardigan pattern for kids 2t-10 yrs or for the adult version check out coffee bean cardigan 3 **little coffee bean pattern details ** **gauge ** 18 sts sts & 24 row = 4 /10 cm in st st **yarn ** worsted-weight yarn shown in vintage by berroco 52% acrylic 40% wool 8% nylon 100 g = 217 yds broken out as follows * **main color mc ** approx 180 215 250 290 yds 1 1 2 2 skeins * **contrasting color cc ** approx 100 130 160 190 yds 1 skein *note main color is used for neck cuff hem & button band ribbing as well as stripes you can also consider using a third color for just the rib trim areas 1 skein needed - see photo in gallery for an example * **needles and other supplies ** for body us 8/5 mm 24 /60 cm circ needle or size needed to obtain gauge for sleeves us 8/5 mm dpns or size used to obtain gauge for neck hem & button band ribbing us 7/4 5 mm 24 /60 cm circ needle or 1 needle size smaller than that used to obtain gauge for sleeve cuffs us 7/4 5 mm dpns or 1 needle size smaller than that used to obtain gauge 4 stitch markers 5 removable stitch markers to be used during buttonhole placement 5 buttons 3/4 in diameter stitch holders or 2 pieces of scrap yarn around 20 /51 cm in length tapestry needle 1 https //elizabethsmithknits com/product/little-coffee-bean-baby-hat/ 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wonder-years-toddler-child-cardigan 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/coffee-bean-cardigan
